channel.title: Django on Quick Reference
channel.description: Recent content in Django on Quick Reference

item.title: Django : Day 10
item.description: Learn this if you want to continue with Django Templates based website

item.title: Django : Day 9
item.description: Learn how to send emails, use middleware, generate tokens, and manage users in Django.

item.title: Django : Day 8
item.description: Learn how to manage user sessions in Django, including adding, retrieving, modifying, and deleting session data.

item.title: Django : Day 7
item.description: Learn how to handle form data and file uploads in Django, including setting up media files, serving media files, and using FileField and ImageField.

item.title: Django: Day 6
item.description: Comprehensive overview of Django settings and configuration including database setup, security settings, middleware, templates, and core project configuration options.

item.title: Django: Day 5
item.description: Understand Django model relationships including OneToOne, OneToMany, and ManyToMany. Learn how to define, create, update, and query these relationships.

item.title: Django: Day 4
item.description: Explore Django's admin interface, including creating superusers, registering models, and customizing the admin interface. Learn how to enhance the admin experience with customizations.

item.title: Django: Day 3
item.description: Learn Django Models and database concepts including model creation, fields, migrations, and database configuration. Essential guide for working with Django's ORM system.

item.title: Django: Day 2
item.description: Learn Django Models and database concepts including model creation, fields, migrations, and database configuration. Essential guide for working with Django's ORM system.

item.title: Django: Day 1
item.description: A comprehensive guide to Django fundamentals covering project setup, apps, routing, views, and static file handling - essential concepts for learning Django REST Framework.
